summary: Prevents Falmer Vampires from spawning with regular Falmer when using ASIS.
descriptionHtml:
!!!This is only for ASIS users!!!

In Bethesda's Dawnguard.esm, vampire falmer are listed under "FalmerRace." This means that, when running ASIS, nasty falmer vamps will spawn in regular old falmer ruins.

Talk about immersion-breaking!!! Sheesh!

Be sure to load before your ASIS and Automatic Variants esp's.

Thanks to Plutoman101 and the ASIS team.
Thanks to Leviathan1753 and all those who work on AV/SUM.

This patch contains no resources from ASIS or SUM.
author: smeetooie3
